Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 135th overall pick, by Colorado in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/2015, off George Coletti (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/3/2015, off Jeffrey Ash (PHI)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/17/2017 to a 2-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Injured on 3/6/2017 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4-5 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Kansas City on 8/1/2017...
Drove in 6 runs against Brooklyn on 8/17/2017...
Won World Series with Houston in 2017...
Was claimed off waivers by Brooklyn on 8/25/2018.
Released by Brooklyn on 10/3/2018...
